name: Lycan-Nope
description:
Cursed and locked up, battle against lycanthropy as you escape your captors. You're not a monster though try not to kill anyone. Though that may prove difficult if you see someone...

Can you navigate your way through the 19 levels without getting out of control?

Since launch we have found the itch.io scales the game down on smaller screens which breaks things, most notably the stairs on some levels. We have a fix but cannot push it until voting is over, So until then please be understanding and try to play our game on a larger screen. Thanks!
